title: FIJI DAY CONGRATULATORY MESSAGES FROM THE PRIME MINISTER AND FOREIGN MINISTER OF THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION ...
text: ( Source : Government of the Republic of Fiji ) 10/11/ 2015 Below are the texts of the congratulatory messages sent by the Russian Prime Minister and the Russian Foreign Minister on the 45th anniversary of Fiji's Independence . The first message
